title: Door Into the Dark
description: Hardcover in acceptable condition. First edition reprint. Price-clipped jacket is marked, tanned and edge worn, with a few nicks. Boards lift slightly. Hardcover spine head is bumped. Spine foot, page block and a few pages are lightly marked. Minor abrasions on pages 26 and 27 have partially obscured text, but missing text has been penned in. Remaining text is clear throughout. HCW
author: Seamus Heaney
